column5: The Lower Niagara is in good shape for the weekend. River has over two feet of vis and a nice green colour. Some ice moving around but not that bad at 4pm this afternoon. Here are a few pictures of the current conditions.  Cast Adventures

The river should be good from here on this year as Erie has frozen over and the wind hopefully wont break it up and be able to stir the turbididty up.  http://ice-glaces.ec.gc.ca/prods/NAIS25ECT..._0003593590.gif
Isn't it muddy still? I heard the winds last week had it all mucked up for the weekend. Did you end up doing any fishing?
